content: readme.md kakavacustomizable android app template generator. tool allows to generate empty android project default/ own template. checkout templates/default/ templates/default-kotlin/ more info.motivations've noticed i spend ~15 minutes each , when need create set a project a app a prototype. , need do task more once? automate ! so, meet kakava!requirementspython3downloadclone repo:git clone --branch v1.5 git@github.com:rozag/kakava.git your_path/kakava convenience add to path. put to ~/.bashrc:path=$path:your_path/kakavasample usagesuper quick start (default project current directory)kakavaquick startkakava -d new_project_pathcustom package app namekakava -d new_project_path -n myapp -p com.example.appkotlin android projectkakava -d new_project_path -n myapp -p com.example.app -t default-kotlinopen with androidstudio import project optionkakava -husage: kakava [-h] [-d destination] [-p package] [-n name] [-t template]optional arguments: -h, --help show help message exit -d destination, --destination destination output directory the app -p package, --package package package name, e.g. com.example.app -n name, --name name app name, e.g. myapp -t template, --template template template directory name the templates/ dir-of--box templatesdefault - default template java android appdefault-kotlin - default template kotlin android appadvanced-kotlin - advanced kotlin template can add own template?basically, kakava does is iterate all *.kakava files the template replace each variable substitution desired value the cli params. currently supported variables. therefore create template should:create configure desired project setupreplace package names, class names whatever want the ${variablename} substitutionadd .kakava extension all files such replacementsreduce com/whatever/product folder hierarchy a simple kakavaroot folderput new template templates/ folder the desired name (e.g. -awesome-template)smile, 're awesome :)currently supported params${packagename} -
